long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emoji Mojo is a simple, intuitive and useful search tool. Copy and paste with a single click to use an emoji in your project. With an advanced data set for searchable emoji characters, the app is fully keyboard accessible for assistive technologies too. EmojiMojo is the perfect tool for email marketing professionals, social media managers, and for anyone creating fun, simple, human messages in text.
